## About
I am Msc. student structural engineering at [Universidad del Norte](https://www.uninorte.edu.co/), Barranquilla, Colombia.
Currently, I am working on the Colombian Seismic Risk Model and on assessing risk variation when using alternative intensity measures, such as Average spectral acceleration, AvgSA, under the supervision of Professor [Carlos Arteta](https://scholar.google.es/citations?user=t-xHI9oAAAAJ&hl=es&oi=ao).
My research interests include seismic hazard, seismic risk, and risk in masonry and reinforced concrete structures. <br> You can contact me by [email](mailto:caballerojd@uninorte.edu.co).

<br>

## Research 
1. Estimation of exposure model in cities of the Colombian Caribbean such as Barranquilla, Soledad, and Valledupar.

2. Estimation of seismic risk in cities of the Colombian Caribbean such as Barranquilla, Soledad, Valledupar, and Santa Marta.

3. Fatigue analysis of welded wire mesh used in Colombian construction.
